name: Radosek Pavri

specials.name: Unkind Rush
specials.description: Requirements Radosek has an active Cloak of Ravens; Effect Radosek discorporates into a swarm of shadow ravens and moves up to twice his speed and can move through the spaces of creatures.  This movemet does not trigger reactions.  Any creature whose square Radosek enters takes damage from a Phantom Raven strike (DC 24 basic Reflex save). Radosek can only attempt to damage a creature once in a single use of Unkind Rush.  The Cloak of Ravens is dismissed after using this ability.

specials.name: Terrifying Cold
specials.description: Any creature suffering from a speed penalty from Radosek's spells becomes frightened 1, and its frightened condition does not reduce at the end of its turns.

specials.name: Cloak of Ravens
specials.description: Radosek has gained much of his power through his connection to the ravens he keeps.  As a 2 action activity he can conjure a raven feather cloak around him.  This grants him the ability to speak with ravens (as Speak with Animals), it also grants him the ability to use Unkind Rush and his Phantom Raven strike.  This cloak lasts until dismissed or counteracted (Counteract DC 24).

items: icicle wand, potion of healing (moderate) x2
spells: snowball, chilling spray, shocking grasp, feather fall
daze, detect magic, ray of frost, read aura, chill touch

strikes.name: Phantom Raven
strikes.traits: primal, conjuration, illusion, shadow, range 20 ft

languages: Common, Jotun, Skald, Sylvan, Speak with Animals (Ravens Only)
